      • retrieveWebContent

        private static java.lang.StringBuilder retrieveWebContent​(java.lang.String url)
                                                   throws java.io.IOException

        Retrieves web content in String form.

        Parameters:
        url - the url to retrieve content from.
        Returns:
        the web content requested as a String.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the content cannot be retrieved.

      • getJSONFromHTTP

        public static com.google.gson.JsonObject getJSONFromHTTP​(java.lang.String url)
                                                  throws java.io.IOException

        Reads the address of a URL of a JSON and returns it back.

        Parameters:
        url - the address of the JSON requested to read.
        Returns:
        the JSON at the address in JSONObject form.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a URL stream could not be opened or data could not be read.

      • getJSONFromFTP

        public static com.google.gson.JsonObject getJSONFromFTP​(java.lang.String ftpurl)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException

        Reads the address of an FTP URL of a JSON and returns it back.

        Parameters:
        ftpurl - the address of the JSON requested to read.
        Returns:
        the JSON at the address in JSONObject form.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a URL stream could not be opened or data could not be read.

      • uploadToFTP

        public static void uploadToFTP​(java.lang.String append,
                               int modValue)
                        throws java.io.IOException

        Uploads passed string to FTP.

        Parameters:
        append - the content to affix to the voting JSON.
        modValue - the change in vote (+/-), if any.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if anything happens to the connections.

      • getImageFromJSON

        public static java.awt.Image getImageFromJSON​(com.google.gson.JsonObject jsonObj)
                                       throws java.io.IOException

        Reads and image from a JSONObject.

        Parameters:
        jsonObj - the JSONObject which contains the "img" tag to get the image location.
        Returns:
        an Image read from a URL location.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - if a new URL could not be read from the "img" tag.
        java.io.IOException

      • resizeImage

        public static java.awt.Image resizeImage​(java.awt.Image image)

        Resizes images to fit on screens without scrolling.

        Parameters:
        image - the originally pulled image to resize
        Returns:
        the resized image proportional to the screen size if the scaling image is checked

      • saveImage

        public static void saveImage​(com.google.gson.JsonObject json)
                      throws java.io.IOException

        Saves image to file from JSONObject.

        Parameters:
        json - the JSONObject to get the Image from and save to file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an image could not be found from the JSONObject.

      • addPanelComponents

        public static void addPanelComponents​(javax.swing.JComponent panel,
                                      javax.swing.JComponent... comp)

        A more efficient wrapper for adding JComponents

        Parameters:
        panel - the enclosing swing object to add the comp items to.
        comp - as many JComponent objects as should be added.
